subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nikita Kucherov scored at 2 minutes 6 seconds of the second overtime to give the Tampa Bay Lightning a 2-1 victory over the Canadiens in Montreal in Game 1.
snippet: Nikita Kucherov scored at 2 minutes 6 seconds of the second overtime to give the Tampa Bay Lightning a 2-1 victory over the Canadiens in Montreal in Game 1.
